717826f-a.text:
Broadway, east side, from 216th to 218th Streets (there is no 217th Street), showing the intersection of Broadway with Tenth Avenue. The large building in the centre is the carbarn of the Third Avenue Railway Company.

October 26, 1927.

P. L. Sperr.

717827f-a.text:
5063-5085 Broadway, west side, opposite 216th Street.

October 26, 1927.

P. L. Sperr.

717828f-a.text:
A vacant lot at 5069-5071 Broadway, Opposite 216th Street, showing in the background a brick mansion on Park Terrace East.

June 8, 1933.

P. L. Sperr.
